Symbol.Script_2D:
IF NOT( BITTEST(macro_runtype,4) ) THEN END
! PROJECT2 4,270,2
Symbol.Script_1D:
! ###################################### ! ! BIM-all-doors - DOOR SYSTEM ! ! Module: Case Macro ! ! Manufacturer: common ! Linie: common ! ! (p) 2018-2021 BY DORMAKABA / WRITTEN BY FRANK BEISTER ! openSource by CCO1.0 license since 2025 ! ! https://github.com/dormakaba/bim-all-doors ! ! #############################################################################
! ============================================================================= ! GLOBAL SETTINGS ! =============================================================================
! »»» Arrays
DIM UI_page_subs[] DIM UI_page_names[], UI_page_icons[], UI_page_type[]
! »»» Constants
tlr = 0.00001 !»» accurancy txt = "" !»» Text für alles mögliche sts = 0 !»» Status version = 1.90 !»» Objektversion
! »»» Localization
sprache = language !»» Deutsch
! »»» Common keywords
IF sprache = 1 THEN
commonKey = "unspezifiziert" naKey = "[-]" !"undefiniert" noKey = "nein" yesKey = "ja"
ELSE
commonKey = "unspecific" naKey = "[-]" !"common" noKey = "no" yesKey = "yes"
ENDIF
! ----------------------------------- INDEX NAMES OF ARRAY PARAMETERS (start)
! --------- PRODUCT PARAMETERS
! --------- DEFAULT VALUE ARRAYS
! --------- dk_folding_dimensions[i][…] dki_Falz1 = 1 dki_Falz2 = 2 ! --------- dk_panel_folding_dimensions[i][…] dki_Mittelfalz1 = 1 dki_Mittelfalz2 = 2 dki_Mittelfalz3 = 3 ! --------- dk_open_leaf[i][…] dka_leaf_angle2D = 1 dka_leaf2_angle2D = 2 dka_leaf_angleSA = 3 dka_leaf2_angleSA = 4 dka_leaf_angle3D = 5 dka_leaf2_angle3D = 6 ! --------- dk_cont_pens[i][…] dka_handle_penC2 = 1 dka_handle_penC3 = 2 dka_frame_penC2 = 3 dka_frame_penC3 = 4 dka_panel_penC2 = 5 dka_panel_penC3 = 6 dka_opline2D = 7 dka_oplineSA = 8 dka_opline3D = 9 dka_topview_penC2 = 10 dka_penInvisible = 11 dka_closer_penSA = 12 dka_closer_pen3D = 13 dka_penC = 14 dka_penC = 15 ! --------- dk_fill_pens[i][…] dka_handle_penF = 1 dka_frame_penF = 2 dka_side1_penF = 3 dka_side2_penF = 4 dka_panel_penF = 5 dka_panelfill1_penF = 6 dka_panelfill2_penF = 7 dka_panelfill3_penF = 8 dka_panel2fill1_penF = 9 dka_panel2fill2_penF = 10 dka_panel2fill3_penF = 11 dka_topview_penF = 12 dka_fan_penF = 13 dka_penF = 14 dka_penF = 15 ! --------- dk_bkg_pens[i][…] dka_handle_penB = 1 dka_frame_penB = 2 dka_side1_penB = 3 dka_side2_penB = 4 dka_panel_penB = 5 dka_panelfill1_penB = 6 dka_panelfill2_penB = 7 dka_panelfill3_penB = 8 dka_panel2fill1_penB = 9 dka_panel2fill2_penB = 10 dka_panel2fill3_penB = 11 dka_topview_penB = 12 dka_fan_penB = 13 dka_penB = 14 dka_penB = 15 ! --------- dk_fills[i][…] dka_handle_fill = 1 dka_frame_fill = 2 dka_side1_fill = 3 dka_side2_fill = 4 dka_panel_fill = 5 dka_panelfill1_fill = 6 dka_panelfill2_fill = 7 dka_panelfill3_fill = 8 dka_panel2fill1_fill = 9 dka_panel2fill2_fill = 10 dka_panel2fill3_fill = 11 dka_topview_fill = 12 dka_fan_fill = 13 dka_fill = 14 dka_fill = 15 ! --------- dk_linetype[i][…] dka_invisible = 1 ! --------- dk_materials[i][…] dka_handle_mat = 1 dka_plate_mat = 2 dka_frame_mat_BS = 3 dka_frame_mat_BGS = 4 dka_side1_mat_BS = 5 dka_side1_mat_BGS = 6 dka_side2_mat_BS = 7 dka_side2_mat_BGS = 8 dka_fan_mat_BS = 9 dka_fan_mat_BGS = 10 dka_panel_mat_BS = 11 dka_panel_mat_BGS = 12 dka_panelfill1_mat_BS = 13 dka_panelfill1_mat_BGS = 14 dka_panelfill2_mat_BS = 15 dka_panelfill2_mat_BGS = 16 dka_panelfill3_mat_BS = 17 dka_panelfill3_mat_BGS = 18 dka_panel2_mat_BS = 19 dka_panel2_mat_BGS = 20 dka_panel2fill1_mat_BS = 21 dka_panel2fill1_mat_BGS = 22 dka_panel2fill2_mat_BS = 23 dka_panel2fill2_mat_BGS = 24 dka_panel2fill3_mat_BS = 25 dka_panel2fill3_mat_BGS = 26 dka_hinge_mat = 27 dka_closer_mat = 28 dka_mat = 29 dka_mat = 30 dka_mat = 31 dka_mat = 32 dka_mat = 33
! ----------------------------------- INDEX NAMES OF ARRAY PARAMETERS (end)
! ----------------------------------- MULTILINGUAL TEXT [ECD.hinge] (start)
! --------- RESET array variables DIM uiTXT[]
! --------- User Interface - UI_xxxFIELD text (Deutsch) IF language = 1 THEN uiTXT[1] = "SCHLOSS" ENDIF ! --------- User Interface - UI_xxxFIELD text (Englisch) IF language = 4 THEN uiTXT[1] = "CASE" ENDIF
! ----------------------------------- MULTILINGUAL TEXT (end)
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------[ environment ]
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------[ settings / locals ]
! UI_page_type = -2 > sub of ROOT, -1 > sub of last, 1 > sub of first macro page
seiten = 0
IF dk_LOI = 5 THEN seiten = 1 UI_page_names[seiten] = uiTXT[1] ! "SCHLOSS" UI_page_icons[seiten] = "dk_title_case 18x18.png" UI_page_type[seiten] = -1 UI_page_subs[seiten] = 8100 ENDIF
IF dk_LOI = 6 THEN seiten = 1 UI_page_names[seiten] = uiTXT[1] ! "SCHLOSS" UI_page_icons[seiten] = "dk_title_case 18x18.png" UI_page_type[seiten] = -1 UI_page_subs[seiten] = 8000
! IF dk_LOI = dk_LOI+1 THEN ! seiten = seiten+1 ! UI_page_names[seiten] = uiTXT[2] ! "SCHLOSS 2. Seite" ! UI_page_icons[seiten] = "uiTab_DoorHorizontalDim_flat(1).png" ! UI_page_type[seiten] = 1 ! UI_page_subs[seiten] = 8000 ! ENDIF
ENDIF
! ============================================================================= ! FEHLERARRAY ! =============================================================================
! »»» Fehlermeldungen DIM errorQ[] errorI = 0 errorQ[1] = ""
! »»» ... aus Plausibilitäten IF GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE THEN
If ((bs_lock_type = "FR" AND bs_lock_panic # 1 ) OR \ (bs_lock_type = "RI")) AND bs_demand_EscapeRoute = 1 THEN errorI = errorI+1 : errorQ[errorI] = "Schloss nicht zulässig für Fluchtweganforderung." ENDIF
If STRSTR( bs_ac_identify1 + bs_ac_identify2, "ID" ) AND ( bs_access_control_type = "-" OR bs_lock_type = "FA" ) THEN errorI = errorI+1 : errorQ[errorI] = "Zugangskontrollsystem erforderlich." ENDIF
If (bs_ac_identify1 = "ID" OR bs_ac_identify1 = "ZID") AND ( bs_locking_side # "ZS" AND bs_locking_side # "BS" ) THEN errorI = errorI+1 : errorQ[errorI] = "Zugangskontrolle von Bandseite gefordert." ENDIF
If (bs_ac_identify2 = "ID" OR bs_ac_identify2 = "ZID") AND ( bs_locking_side # "ZS" AND bs_locking_side # "BGS" ) THEN errorI = errorI+1 : errorQ[errorI] = "Zugangskontrolle von Bandgegenseite gefordert." ENDIF
! IF sts THEN ! GOSUB "debuginfo" ! errorI = errorI+1 : errorQ[errorI] = ""+txt ! ENDIF
ENDIF
! ============================================================================= ! question - answer mode / HANDSHAKE ! =============================================================================
IF macro_runtype = 1 THEN END UI_page_type ! »»» return UI page hirarchy IF macro_runtype = 2 THEN END UI_page_names ! »»» return UI page names IF macro_runtype = 4 THEN END UI_page_icons ! »»» return UI page picts IF macro_runtype = 256 THEN END errorQ ! »»» Fehlermeldung
! ============================================================================= ! LOD - Level of Detail ! =============================================================================
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------[ ... ]
GOTO "masterend"
! ============================================================================= ! ============================================================================= ! ! SUBROUTINES ! ! ============================================================================= ! =============================================================================
! »»» Errorcontent: "debuginfo": IF BITTEST(sts,0) THEN txt = "Schloss passt nicht " ELSE txt="" IF BITTEST(sts,1) THEN txt = txt + STRSUB(", ",1,2*(txt#"")) + "zu XXX" IF BITTEST(sts,2) THEN txt = txt + STRSUB(", ",1,2*(txt#"")) + "zu XXX" IF BITTEST(sts,3) THEN txt = txt + STRSUB(", ",1,2*(txt#"")) + "zu XXX" IF BITTEST(sts,4) THEN txt = txt + STRSUB(", ",1,2*(txt#"")) + "zu XXX" IF BITTEST(sts,5) THEN txt = txt + STRSUB(", ",1,2*(txt#"")) + "zu XXX" IF txt # "" THEN txt = " ("+txt+")" RETURN
"masterend":
Symbol.Script_UI:
!-------------------------------------------- [ Standardelemente aller Seiten ]
! »»» Standardwerte
DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvaluesArray[] ! Arrays für diskrete Auswahlen UI_INFIELD{4}
! format = "" : sts = REQUEST ("Working_length_unit", "",format) ! Format für UI-Outfield -Längenwerte
! ----------------------------------- MULTILINGUAL TEXT [ECD.hinge] (start)
! --------- RESET array variables DIM babel[] DIM bubble[]
! --------- User Interface - UI_xxxFIELD text (Deutsch) IF language = 1 THEN babel[1] = "Schloss:" babel[2] = "Typ:" babel[3] = "Hersteller / Produkt:" babel[4] = "Schlosstyp:" babel[5] = "Form/Material/Oberfläche:" babel[6] = "Gangflügel:" babel[7] = "Position:" babel[8] = "Schließung:" babel[9] = "Zylindertyp:" babel[10] = "Dornmaß:" babel[11] = "Entfernung:" babel[12] = "mit Elektrik" babel[13] = "mit Elektronik:" babel[14] = "Panikfunktion" babel[15] = "Panikfunktion:" babel[16] = "Schließanlage" babel[17] = "Schließseite:" babel[18] = "Türöffner" babel[19] = "Türöffner:" babel[20] = "Wechselfunktion" babel[21] = "Wechselfunktion:" babel[22] = "Vierkant:" babel[23] = "Verriegelung:" babel[24] = "Verriegelung SF" babel[25] = "Selbstverriegelnd" babel[26] = "Standflügel:" babel[27] = "Anforderung:" babel[28] = "Stulp:" ENDIF ! --------- User Interface - UI_xxxFIELD text (Englisch) IF language = 4 THEN babel[1] = "Case:" babel[2] = "Type:" babel[3] = "Hersteller / Produkt:" babel[4] = "Schlosstyp:" babel[5] = "Form/Material/Oberfläche:" babel[6] = "Gangflügel:" babel[7] = "Position:" babel[8] = "Locking:" babel[9] = "Zylindertyp:" babel[10] = "Dornmaß:" babel[11] = "Entfernung:" babel[12] = "mit Elektrik" babel[13] = "mit Elektronik:" babel[14] = "Panikfunktion" babel[15] = "Panikfunktion:" babel[16] = "Schließanlage" babel[17] = "Schließseite:" babel[18] = "Türöffner" babel[19] = "Türöffner:" babel[20] = "Wechselfunktion" babel[21] = "Wechselfunktion:" babel[22] = "Vierkant:" babel[23] = "Verriegelung:" babel[24] = "Verriegelung SF" babel[25] = "Selbstverriegelnd" babel[26] = "Standflügel:" babel[27] = "Anforderung:" babel[28] = "Stulp:" ENDIF
! --------- User Interface - Tooltip text (Deutsch) IF language = 1 THEN bubble[1] = "Modell / Produktbezeichnung" bubble[2] = "Zugangskontrollsystem" bubble[3] = "Zylindertyp" bubble[4] = "Hersteller Türschloss" bubble[5] = "Zylindertyp/Mechanische Verriegelung" bubble[6] = "Dornmaß Gangflügel" bubble[7] = "Dornmaß Standflügel" bubble[8] = "Elektrischer Türöffner" bubble[9] = "Elektronisches Schloss" bubble[10] = "Entfernungsmaß Gangflügel" bubble[11] = "Entfernungsmaß Standflügel" bubble[12] = "Falle mit Schlüssel öffnen" bubble[13] = "Form Stulpblech" bubble[14] = "Vierkantmaß/Lochung Gangflügel" bubble[15] = "Vierkantmaß/Lochung Standflügel" bubble[16] = "Material Stulpblech" bubble[17] = "Oberfläche Stulpblech" bubble[18] = "Panikfunktionen" bubble[19] = "Schließanlage" bubble[20] = "Schloßtyp" bubble[21] = "Seite der Schließung" bubble[22] = "Selbstverriegelnd" bubble[23] = "Standflügelverriegelung" bubble[24] = "Verriegelungsfunktionen" bubble[25] = "Homepage generische Tür" ENDIF ! --------- User Interface - Tooltip text (Englisch) IF language = 4 THEN bubble[1] = "Modell / Produktbezeichnung" bubble[2] = "Access control system" bubble[3] = "Zylindertyp" bubble[4] = "Hersteller Türschloss" bubble[5] = "Zylindertyp/Mechanische Verriegelung" bubble[6] = "Dornmaß Gangflügel" bubble[7] = "Dornmaß Standflügel" bubble[8] = "Elektrischer Türöffner" bubble[9] = "Elektronisches Schloss" bubble[10] = "Entfernungsmaß Gangflügel" bubble[11] = "Entfernungsmaß Standflügel" bubble[12] = "Falle mit Schlüssel öffnen" bubble[13] = "Form Stulpblech" bubble[14] = "Lochung Gangflügel" bubble[15] = "Lochung Standflügel" bubble[16] = "Material Stulpblech" bubble[17] = "Oberfläche Stulpblech" bubble[18] = "Panikfunktionen" bubble[19] = "Schließanlage" bubble[20] = "Schloßtyp" bubble[21] = "Seite der Schließung" bubble[22] = "Selbstverriegelnd" bubble[23] = "Standflügelverriegelung" bubble[24] = "Verriegelungsfunktionen" bubble[25] = "Homepage generische Tür" ENDIF
! ----------------------------------- MULTILINGUAL TEXT (end)
! ============================================================================= ! Dialogstart ! =============================================================================
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------[ Dialog start in development environment ]
IF macro_runtype # 128 THEN UI_DIALOG "DORMA CASE MACRO V"+STR(version,3,2), 444,266 ENDIF
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------[ 1. Seite ]
s = 1 IF seiten > 0 THEN IF macro_runtype = 0 THEN : UIpage = s : UIpage_number = UIpage : UIpage_parent = UI_page_type[s] : ENDIF ! »»» Development IF UIpage_number = s THEN GOSUB UI_page_subs[s] ENDIF
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------[ 2. Seite ]
s = 2 IF seiten > 1 THEN IF macro_runtype = 0 THEN : UIpage = s : UIpage_number = UIpage : UIpage_parent = UI_page_type[s] : ENDIF ! »»» Development IF UIpage_number = s THEN GOSUB UI_page_subs[s] ENDIF
! ============================================================================= ! Dialogende ! =============================================================================
END
! ============================================================================= ! ============================================================================= ! ! SUBROUTINES ! ! ============================================================================= ! =============================================================================
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------[ Auswahloptionen ]
"devshow": UI_STYLE 1,2 UI_OUTFIELD "[CASE v" + str("%^.2",version) + "]" , 60,0,100,15, 4
! i=0 : s=20 ! UI_STYLE 0,0 ! i = i : UI_INFIELD{3} "dk_LOI", 475,i*s , 15,19 UI_TOOLTIP "Level of Input" ! i = i+1 : UI_INFIELD{3} "bs_door_leafs", 475,i*s , 15,19 UI_TOOLTIP "Türblätter" RETURN
"devSELECTION": FOR i= 1 TO VARDIM1(UIpicIdxArray) ui_outfield UIpicIdxArray[i], 0,260+i*15,140,15 ui_outfield UItextArray[i] , 150,260+i*15,140,15 ui_outfield UIvaluesArray[i], 300,260+i*15,140,15 NEXT i RETURN
! ----------------------------------- PARAMETER / INFIELD VALUE LIST [ECD.hinge] (start)
"VALUES_bs_access_control_type": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvaluesArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Aus" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "-" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "undefiniert" : UIvaluesArray[j] = " " j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Mechanisch" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "M" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Schlüssel" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "S" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Karte/Chip" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "K" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Code" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "C" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Ferngesteuert" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "F" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Biometrisch" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "B" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "individuell" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "X" RETURN
"VALUES_bs_lock_type": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvaluesArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "undefiniert" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "XX" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Fallen-Riegelschloß" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "FR" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Fallenschloß" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "FA" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Riegelschloß" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "RI" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Rollenfallenschloß" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "RF" RETURN
"VALUES_bs_lock_system": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvaluesArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "einfach" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "1f" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "zweifach" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "2f" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "mehrfach" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "3f" RETURN
"VALUES_bs_case_material": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvaluesArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "undefiniert" : UIvaluesArray[j] = " " j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Stahl" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "ST" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Edelstahl" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "ES" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Aluminium" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "AL" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Messing" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "MS" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Sondermaterial" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "XX" RETURN
"VALUES_bs_case_surface": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvaluesArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "undefiniert" : UIvaluesArray[j] = " " j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "unbehandelt" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "-" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Gebürstet" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "B" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Geschliffen" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "S" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Getrommelt" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "T" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Poliert" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "P" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Vernickelt" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "N" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Lackiert" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "L" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Pulverbeschichtet" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "V" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Verzinkt" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "Z" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Verchromt" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "C" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Eloxiert" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "E" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Titanisiert" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "T" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Vergoldet" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "G" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Sonderoberfläche" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "X" RETURN
"VALUES_bs_latch_plate": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvaluesArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "rund" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "R" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "kantig" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "K" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "U-Form" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "U" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "abgwinkelt" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "W" RETURN
"VALUES_gs_han_pos": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvalRealArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "individuell" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.02 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Zimmertür 55mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.055 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Zimmertür 60mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.06 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Haustür 65mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.065 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Rohrrahmentür 30mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.03 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Rohrrahmentür 35mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.035 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Rohrrahmentür 40mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.04 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Rohrrahmentür 45mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.045 RETURN
"VALUES_bs_case_distance": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvalRealArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "individuell" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.09 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Standard" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.072 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "WC-Schloss" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.078 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Rohrrahmen/Haustür" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.092 RETURN
"VALUES_gs_han_pos2": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvalRealArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "individuell" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.02 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Zimmertür 55mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.055 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Zimmertür 60mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.06 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Haustür 65mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.065 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Rohrrahmentür 30mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.03 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Rohrrahmentür 35mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.035 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Rohrrahmentür 40mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.04 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Rohrrahmentür 45mm" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.045 RETURN
"VALUES_bs_case_distance2": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvalRealArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "individuell" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.09 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Standard" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.072 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "WC-Schloss" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.078 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Rohrrahmen/Haustür" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0.092 RETURN
"VALUES_bs_lock_panic": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvalRealArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "nein" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "ja" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 1 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "unbestimmt" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 2 RETURN
"VALUES_bs_lock_change": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvalRealArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "nein" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "ja" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 1 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "unbestimmt" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 2 RETURN
"VALUES_bs_selflocking": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvalRealArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "nein" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "ja" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 1 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "unbestimmt" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 2 RETURN
"VALUES_bs_lock_SF": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvalRealArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "nein" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "ja" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 1 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "unbestimmt" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 2 RETURN
"VALUES_bs_lock_master": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvalRealArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "nein" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "ja" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 1 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "unbestimmt" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 2 RETURN
"VALUES_bs_lock_barrel": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvaluesArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "kein Zylinder" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "-" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Profilzylinder" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "PZ" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Rundzylinder" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "RZ" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Ovallochung" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "OZ" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Buntbart" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "BB" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "WC" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "WC" RETURN
"VALUES_bs_locking_side": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvaluesArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "zweiseitig" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "ZS" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Bandseite" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "BS" j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Bandgegenseite" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "BGS" RETURN
"VALUES_bs_lock_electric": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvalRealArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "nein" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "ja" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 1 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "unbestimmt" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 2 RETURN
"VALUES_bs_lock_opener": j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvalRealArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "nein" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 0 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "ja" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 1 j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "unbestimmt" : UIvalRealArray[j] = 2 RETURN
! --------------------------------------------------------------- PARAMETER / INFIELD VALUE LIST (end)
"SELECT_bs_lock_type": IF bs_lock_change = 1 THEN j = 0 : DIM UIpicIdxArray[], UItextArray[], UIvaluesArray[] j=j+1 : UIpicIdxArray[j] = j : UItextArray[j] = "Fallen-Riegelschloß" : UIvaluesArray[j] = "FR" ELSE GOSUB "VALUES_bs_lock_type" ENDIF RETURN
"SELECT_bs_access_control_type": GOSUB "VALUES_bs_access_control_type" sts = 0 IF bs_access_control_type # "X" THEN FOR i = 1 TO j IF UIvaluesArray[i] = bs_access_control_type THEN sts = 1 NEXT i ENDIF RETURN
"SELECT_bs_case_material": GOSUB "VALUES_bs_case_material" sts = 0 IF bs_case_material # "XX" THEN FOR i = 1 TO j IF UIvaluesArray[i] = bs_case_material THEN sts = 1 NEXT i ENDIF RETURN
"SELECT_bs_case_surface": GOSUB "VALUES_bs_case_surface" sts = 0 IF bs_case_surface # "X" THEN FOR i = 1 TO j IF UIvaluesArray[i] = bs_case_surface THEN sts = 1 NEXT i ENDIF RETURN
"SELECT_gs_han_pos": GOSUB "VALUES_gs_han_pos" sts = 0 IF ABS(gs_han_pos - 0.02) > tlr THEN FOR i = 2 TO j IF ABS(UIvalRealArray[i] - gs_han_pos) < tlr THEN sts = 1 NEXT i ENDIF RETURN
"SELECT_gs_han_pos2": GOSUB "VALUES_gs_han_pos2" sts = 0 IF ABS(gs_han_pos2 - 0.02) > tlr THEN FOR i = 2 TO j IF ABS(UIvalRealArray[i] - gs_han_pos2) < tlr THEN sts = 1 NEXT i ENDIF RETURN
"SELECT_bs_case_distance": GOSUB "VALUES_bs_case_distance" sts = 0 IF ABS(bs_case_distance - 0.09) > tlr THEN FOR i = 2 TO j IF ABS(UIvalRealArray[i] - bs_case_distance) < tlr THEN sts = 1 NEXT i ENDIF RETURN
"SELECT_bs_case_distance2": GOSUB "VALUES_bs_case_distance2" sts = 0 IF ABS(bs_case_distance2 - 0.09) > tlr THEN FOR i = 2 TO j IF ABS(UIvalRealArray[i] - bs_case_distance2) < tlr THEN sts = 1 NEXT i ENDIF RETURN

, 139,15, 1 UI_SEPARATOR 0,15, 481,15 IF errorI>0 THEN txt = "" FOR i=1 TO errorI txt = txt + errorQ[errorI] NEXT i UI_PICT "dk_attention 16x16.png", 36,-2 , 16,16, 1 UI_TOOLTIP txt ENDIF RETURN
Symbol.Script_VL:
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------[ Module development settings ]
IF macro_runtype = 0 THEN VALUES{2} "macro_runtype" 0, "IDLE", 1,"handshake page hirarchy", 2,"handshake page names", 3,"CALL UI page", 5,"return element values", 10,"rebuilt VALUE lists" ENDIF
! ============================================================================= ! PLAUSIBILITY ! =============================================================================
! ----------------------------------------------------------------- Parameterabhängigkeiten
! »»» Wechselfunktion nur bei Fallen-Riegelschloss IF gs_han_pos < 0.046 AND GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_han_pos" AND bs_control_side = "-" THEN bs_case_distance = 0.092 PARAMETERS bs_case_distance = bs_case_distance ENDIF
IF gs_han_pos2 < 0.046 AND GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_han_pos2" AND bs_control_side = "-" THEN bs_case_distance2 = 0.092 PARAMETERS bs_case_distance2 = bs_case_distance2 ENDIF
! »»» Wechselfunktion nur bei Fallen-Riegelschloss IF bs_lock_type = "FA" THEN bs_access_control_type = "-" bs_lock_type = "FR" bs_lock_panic = 0 : bs_lock_change = 0 : bs_selflocking = 0 : bs_lock_master = 0 bs_lock_barrel = "-" PARAMETERS bs_access_control_type = bs_access_control_type, bs_lock_panic = bs_lock_panic, bs_lock_change = bs_lock_change, bs_selflocking = bs_selflocking, bs_lock_master = bs_lock_master, bs_lock_barrel = bs_lock_barrel LOCK "bs_lock_system", "bs_locking_side", "bs_access_control_type", "bs_lock_panic", "bs_lock_change", "bs_selflocking", "bs_lock_master", "bs_lock_barrel" ENDIF
! »»» Panik- und Wechsel funktion ohne Falle nicht möglich IF bs_lock_type = "RI" THEN bs_lock_panic = 0 : bs_lock_change = 0 PARAMETERS bs_lock_panic = bs_lock_panic, bs_lock_change = bs_lock_change LOCK "bs_lock_panic", "bs_lock_change" ENDIF
! »»» Wechselfunktion nur bei Fallen-Riegelschloss IF bs_lock_change = 1 AND bs_lock_type # "FR" THEN bs_lock_type = "FR" PARAMETERS bs_lock_type = bs_lock_type ENDIF
! »»» Elektrifizierung setzen (Bit 5) IF bs_lock_electric = 1 THEN bs_door_electrified = BITSET(bs_door_electrified, 5) ELSE bs_door_electrified = BITSET(bs_door_electrified, 5, 0) ENDIF PARAMETERS bs_door_electrified = bs_door_electrified
! »»» Einflügelig IF bs_door_leafs < 2 THEN PARAMETERS bs_lock_SF = 2 LOCK "bs_lock_SF" ENDIF
! ============================================================================= ! VALUES ! =============================================================================
! ----------------------------------- PARAMETER VALUE LIST [ECD.hinge] (start)
